document_data.name: Dalakhar
document_data.mainbody: '''Dalakhar''' was a [[thief]] and spy in [[Waterdeep]] working for Lord [[Dagult Neverember]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History:
In [[1492 DR]],{{WDH-time}} Dalakhar was spying upon [[Renaer Neverember]], the estranged son of his master. At one point, however, Lord Dagult ordered many of his agents, including Dalakhar, to obtain the ''[[stone of Golorr]]'' from the lair of the [[Xanathar]]. The rock gnome managed to steal the stone, ruining a meeting between Xanathar and the [[Zhentarim]].

Later, Dalakhar was targeted by agents of the Zhentarim, the [[Xanathar's Thieves' Guild]], [[Bregan D'aerthe]], and others, making it impossible for him to get out of Waterdeep as planned.
document_data.Personality: Dalakhar was very loyal to his master, believing Dagult to be the rightful [[Open Lord]] of Waterdeep.
